info.name: Facebook Background Generator (black)
info.description: The background generator for my Black Facebook theme. Choose from six different wallpapers, and override the theme's plain black background. pfeiffer stylez is also on Facebook.
info.additionalInfo: This is not a stand-alone style, just the background. You'll also need the Black Facebook theme to get what you see in the preview images.

options.label: Granite
options.value: background: #000 url("http://i.imgur.com/jEHeXro.jpg") center center no-repeat fixed !important; background-size: cover !important;

options.label: Black Wood
options.value: background: #000 url("http://i.imgur.com/lR9FHpT.png") center center repeat fixed !important;

options.value: background: #000 url("http://i.imgur.com/k679K1Q.jpg") center center no-repeat fixed !important; background-size: cover !important;
